title: PBE Shop
body: Can we have another way to access to the shop? Because if you want to buy a skin or try it you can't buy it.

replies.body:
Most issues in the store stem from problems with Internet Explorer, which is what the client uses to display the store. Our [Store Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660) goes over the most common solutions.

Let me know if this helped.
Ummmm but its the PBE shop not the normal shop.

The PBE store also operates with Internet Explorer unless you're on the Alpha client. If you're still seeing issues, I recommend reaching out to our Tech specialists by [submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

If you have any questions, let me know.
Can you describe your issue with more details please? Are you using Linux? Do you have "session expired" written?
